com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.business.service

Interface GUIService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GUIServiceImpl

    public GUIService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUIService

        public GUIService()

    • Method Detail

      • open

        <P> void open(P player,
              java.lang.String pageName)

        Opens the gui for the given player. Does nothing when the GUI is already open.

        Type Parameters:
        P -

        the type of the player.

        See Also:
        player

      • close

        <P> void close(P player)

        Closes the gui for the given player. Does nothing when the GUI is already closed.

        Type Parameters:
        P -

        the type of the player.

        See Also:
        player

      • isGUIInventory

        <I> boolean isGUIInventory(I inventory,
                           int relativeSlot)

        Returns if the given inventory matches the inventory of this service.

        Type Parameters:
        I -

        the type of the inventory.

        Parameters:
        relativeSlot - which determines half managed gui inventories.
        See Also:
        inventory

      • cleanResources

        <P> void cleanResources(P player)

        Clears all resources the given player has allocated from this service.

        Type Parameters:
        P -

        the type of the player.

      • clickInventoryItem

        <P,I> void clickInventoryItem(P player,
                              int relativeSlot,
                              I item)

        Executes actions when the given player clicks on an item at the given relativeSlot.

        Type Parameters:
        P -

        the type of the player.

        I -

        the type of the inventory.

        See Also:
        player, item, relativeSlot
